## ConfigurableProductOptionsSelection interface

Metadata corresponding to the configurable options selection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConfigurableProductOptionsSelection 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [media\_gallery?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsselection.media_gallery.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[MediaGalleryInterface](./magento-api.mediagalleryinterface.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Product images and videos corresponding to the specified configurable options selection. |
|  [options\_available\_for\_selection?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsselection.options_available_for_selection.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[ConfigurableOptionAvailableForSelection](./magento-api.configurableoptionavailableforselection.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Configurable options available for further selection based on current selection. |
|  [variant?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsselection.variant.md) | Maybe&lt;[SimpleProduct](./magento-api.simpleproduct.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Variant represented by the specified configurable options selection. It is expected to be null, until selections are made for each configurable option. |
